attributes.action: prevent financially vunerable bank customers from accessing their money as the banks need it more than the depositors.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government, through the FSA, has prevented the financially vunerable from claiming back unfair bank charges in a court of law. However, this does not go far enough. In order to support the major banks who have fallen on hard times through no fault of their own, the Government should prevent people from making withdrawls and encourage more deposits.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
